{{cpp/ranges/zip_view/iterator/title|operator*}}
{{cpp/ranges/zip_view/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|
constexpr auto operator*() const;
}}

Returns a {{lc|std::tuple}} that consists of underlying pointed-to elements.

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|current_}} denote the underlying tuple-like object that holds iterators to elements of adapted views. Equivalent to: {{source|1=
return /*tuple-transform*/([](auto&amp; i) -&gt; decltype(auto) { return *i; }, current_);
}}

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The current tuple-like element.

===Notes===
{{c|operator-&gt;}} is not provided.
